titles.title: Nutrition and Health Information Act
To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for a biennial report on nutrition and health by the Surgeon General of the Public Health Service.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1788-1790)
Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 7/15/1993--Introduced. Nutrition and Health Information Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to require the Surgeon General to report biennially on the relationship between nutrition and health. Authorizes appropriations.
